titleStmt.title: An order to be published and executed by the Lord Maior of the citie of London and other officers in all places within three miles of the sayd citie, for auoyding of all kinde of beggars that doe wander about contrary to the laws and statues [sic] of the realme.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.
Rowe, William, Sir, d. 1593.
City of London (England).

publicationStmt.publisher: By Hugh Singleton [B. Norton and J. Bill,

notesStmt.note: Additional printers' names and publication date from STC.
The order is dated in text: the xvij. of April. 1593.
Signed at end: Printed, published and set vp by order from the foresayd Lords of Her Maiesties most Honorable Priuie Councell. William Rowe maior.
Identified as STC 8227 on UMI microfilm reel 565 and as STC 16714 on UMI microfilm reel 1315.
Appears at reel 565 and reel 1315 (both Bodleian Library copies).
Reproduction of the originals in the Bodleian Library.
